name: Free VPN Next Pro
summary: VPN extension with P2P Unblocking Cloud feature that silently enrolls users as residential proxy exit nodes. Google Analytics proxy bypass leaks real user IPs. Server-controlled 308 redirect mechanism enables arbitrary request routing. Full error/response body exfiltration to server-controlled reporting endpoint.

vulnerabilities.title: P2P Residential Proxy Exit Node
vulnerabilities.description: P2P Unblocking Cloud feature makes users' browsers fetch arbitrary URLs for other users via the backend, turning them into residential proxy exit nodes.

vulnerabilities.title: Google Analytics Proxy Bypass
vulnerabilities.description: google-analytics.com is in the proxy bypass list, leaking real user IP to Google even while VPN is active.

vulnerabilities.title: Server-Controlled Redirect Mechanism
vulnerabilities.description: 308 redirect with server-supplied URLs enables arbitrary request routing from authenticated API calls.

flags.description: P2P Unblocking Cloud enrolls users as residential proxy exit nodes without clear informed consent
Server-controlled 308 redirect and x-delay response header enable remote behavior modification
